data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=T5t_ZBeO4CYQ7kNvgEzzCm1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Aunb79Ojhw2nGcsmE6Ah619&oh=00_AYC1mOgFV_OCX6iRufdhAFY1b-PyPQgCRLOJMWHEVW07vw&oe=66F3F49C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=KFpkzmjrGtQQ7kNvgHHJwUH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Aunb79Ojhw2nGcsmE6Ah619&oh=00_AYDGFm4ldMe7U4m5tCaGTGIoSscv9bU0AoKdg2KoGh7GtA&oe=66F3FE24)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=YVszPvSDxEoQ7kNvgFIEk36&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Aunb79Ojhw2nGcsmE6Ah619&oh=00_AYCcScg64KqtitSZU_X3HLnXUfdtXQEYf0l3W0fRrL-Jfg&oe=66F3E587)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0uRDHfFWnyoQ7kNvgHBbjWU&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Aunb79Ojhw2nGcsmE6Ah619&oh=00_AYByDbEVsYaFcCWw_M-YMCGCHjSYSMdwTwrLRzJy3xR1Gw&oe=66F3D866)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9CClbeu6iycQ7kNvgEt-tiR&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Aunb79Ojhw2nGcsmE6Ah619&oh=00_AYBIX4Oh_HuOJJDEyGZi73xfV22VJWUqil7qZh9-LlSQMA&oe=66F404D8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bccqqurMobUQ7kNvgEqOR-f&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Aunb79Ojhw2nGcsmE6Ah619&oh=00_AYD4Y99smuEJm5HxsX-4A3W4oWfTAQ6WjTtPrqAeJiUoTw&oe=66F40159)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=WfVpNWOY0f8Q7kNvgFfD_Kn&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Aunb79Ojhw2nGcsmE6Ah619&oh=00_AYCyQjZpEuHqYPcbL08AssYp18qvn7vgReIWDboSQr6l0Q&oe=66F3E770)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Po78wc5I8ZAQ7kNvgFhDbo9&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Aunb79Ojhw2nGcsmE6Ah619&oh=00_AYBxYhX1hUsBhzbYl4tOX7zeeuetm1djrL_r7_wCgGWSfQ&oe=66F3D1EA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=24qy0MdOLgMQ7kNvgH6EJ_d&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Aunb79Ojhw2nGcsmE6Ah619&oh=00_AYATsnEwvjbhKZWcCDoSdepB98o2WxKAfNMFGubPVNSB2w&oe=66F3E597)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BlBmKtHZJosQ7kNvgHC2rJ3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Aunb79Ojhw2nGcsmE6Ah619&oh=00_AYC3e5KfGIuBQwZIYRa21f5A42nzwFVVlD2jT5CE1R9AzQ&oe=66F4010C)
